newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: VNU BUYS 26 PCT OF INDIA'S ORG MARG.
newsitem.headline: VNU BUYS 26 PCT OF INDIA'S ORG MARG.

text.p: Dutch publisher NV Verenigd Bezit VNU said on Tuesday it had taken a 26 percent stake in India's ORG MARG, which is a part of Bombay-based Business India Group.
ORG MARG is India's leading company in the area of market research and marketing of information services. The unit posts annual turnover of about 20 million guilders, VNU said in a statement.
"Both turnover and operating profit (of ORG MARG) show strong growth and attractive margins", the Dutch firm added.
VNU said taking the stake represented its first step in the Asian market. Its policy is to expand its worldwide position in the area of marketing information services.
No financial details of the transaction were disclosed.
